description:
The confrontation between the Foreigner, Suzuki and Hibi continues. Junna`s stepfather arrives at the location of the conflict and begins to yell at her for being outside. Then the Foreigner attacks him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do You Know What the Ninja Code Says?
Shinobi no Okite wa Wakatte Iru na?
忍びの掟は分かっているな?
